doc.field: C L f0882reute u f BC-slaughter-guesstimate 03-23 0063

Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 295,000 to 305,000 head versus 295,000 week ago and 305,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 120,000 to 125,000 head versus 114,000 week ago and 119,000 a year ago. Reuter
